descriptors.name: soc_sleepy_switch
descriptors.label: Zigbee - SoC Sleepy Switch
descriptors.description: This application is used to create a Zigbee sleepy end device with the Silicon Labs EFR32xG21 Bluetooth Starter Kit board. Moreover, it can also get some sample test results on EM2 and demonstrate essential troubleshooting approaches.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Zigbee

descriptors.name: zigbee_rtc_time_sync
descriptors.label: Zigbee - Device RTC Time Synchronize
descriptors.description: This project shows how to implement the synchronization time between zigbee devices and zigbee gateway in the zigbee network.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Zigbee

descriptors.name: zigbee_mfglib_extension
descriptors.label: Zigbee - Manufacturing Library Extension
descriptors.description: This project extends manufacturing library plugin with more functionality and commands. Sending and receiving packets, PER test, manipulating tokens, configuring GPIO settings, and changing the power to deci dBm are among the added functionality of this code.

descriptors.name: zigbee_rht_sed
descriptors.label: Zigbee - RHT Si7021 Sleepy End-Device
descriptors.description: This example shows how to use RHT Si7021 sensor on the EFR32xG24 Dev Kit Board and implement it in your Zigbee project with Simplciity Studio. This application acts as an RHT sensor and periodically reports the measured values to the coordinator.
